Introduction

Hui is a South Korean singer-songwriter, composer, and the leader of PENTAGON under Cube Entertainment. He debuted with PENTAGON on October 10, 2016, with their self-titled mini-album PENTAGON. He was also a member of the co-ed group Triple H, alongside Hyuna and Dawn, debuting on May 1, 2017, with the EP 199X and the title track 365 Fresh.

Hui is known for his contributions as a songwriter and composer, having written songs such as Never for Produce 101 Season 2, Energetic for Wanna One, and PENTAGON’s hit tracks Shine and Naughty Boy.

He enlisted in the military on February 18, 2021, and was discharged on November 17, 2022. Shortly after, he participated in the 2023 survival show Boys Planet. On December 21, 2023, it was announced that Hui would make his solo debut on January 16, 2024, with his first mini-album Whu Is Me: Complex.

Fun facts

1
On August 2, 2018, CUBE Entertainment confirmed that Hui and (G)I-DLE‘s Soojin used to date but they’ve broken up.
…
2
Back when they were still trainees under JYP Entertainment, Hui got into a fight with GOT7's Mark. B.A.P's Youngjae and GOT7's JB tried to resolve the situation but ended up getting involved in the fight. DAY6's Young K served as the translator the entire time since Mark couldn't speak Korean well.
…
3
Hui composed the title track "Like This" on "DEMO_01".
…
4
Hui ranked first place at JYP Entertainment's 2010 Auditions.
…
5
Hui ranked second place on Mnet's music battle show "Breakers."
…
6
Hui used to be a trainee under JYP Entertainment.
…
